inputSpec.label: Mappings files
inputSpec.help: Files, in .bam format, that contain alignment and mapping information.
inputSpec.name: mappings

inputSpec.label: Kraken database
inputSpec.help: A compressed archive containing a Kraken database (including database.idx, database.kdb, taxonomy/nodes.dmp and taxonomy/names.dmp).
inputSpec.name: kraken_db

inputSpec.label: Krona database
inputSpec.help: A compressed archive containing a taxonomy database for Krona.
inputSpec.name: krona_taxonomy_db

outputSpec.label: Outputs
outputSpec.help: Taxonomic profiling output files from Kraken and Krona, for each input mappings file.
outputSpec.name: outputs
